resources.string: Select the exam subjects by filing the exam result
Competition for targeted studying. (Sponsored by the company)
Pass score for a budget form of education
The exam result must be between 0 and 100
Select a maximum of three priority directions for admission. You can change your choice at any time
Choose at least one direction of study
You can\'t choose more than three directions
There are no directions for the selected exam subjects
There is no app to read the pdf file.
You can not apply for more than 3 directions

On April 12 at 12: 00 there will be a live broadcast on the website abiturient.bmstu.ru with Boris Vasilyevich Padalkin, the first Vice-rector for academic Affairs, you will learn more about Bauman Moscow state technical University, about the areas of training and admission rules for 2020.
Cannot be shown on the map

⠀ ⠀Bauman Moscow state technical University is a leading Russian University that has produced outstanding scientists and researchers who have become pioneers of the world\'s rocket technology, aviation and heavy industry over its 185-year history. МГ MSTU is shown in a number of QS ratings. Ranked 299th in the QS World University Rankings ® 2017/18, MSTU Baumana leads in a number of technological fields reflected in the QS World University Rankings by Subject 2018, including computer science and information systems, electrical and electronic engineering, mechanical engineering, mathematics, physics and astronomy. ⠀ ⠀If you dream of doing research in such promising fields of science as nanoengineering, providing information security to society, are ready to master the most complex technology and the latest technologies to create new materials, see yourself as a designer of spaceships, aircraft equipment and powerful power systems, want to get a profession that allows you to understand all the subtleties of electronics and microelectronics, strive to become a professional in the field of high-tech management of high-tech industries, take an active life position, ready to think about the future of society, hone your leadership skills, learn to work in a team, the legendary Bauman Moscow state technical University is waiting for you!

This data is used solely for the purpose of personalization of the app, it is not transmitted to third-party services and is stored only on your device. The user is not required to provide their real data.
Why do you need this information?

A passing score is the minimum number of points that it is necessary to enroll in the chosen direction. In other words, if the reception the company ended right now, only those applicants who have the amount would have been accepted points higher than or equal to the current passing score. The passing score changes during the period the entire admission company and depends on the number of original certificates submitted.
You have not selected any program or changed the selected exam subjects

string-array.name: disciplines
string-array.item: 01.03.02 Applied mathematics and computer science (Bachelor\'s Degree)
11.03.03 Design and technology of electronic means (Bachelor\'s Degree)
12.03.05 Laser engineering and laser technologies (Bachelor\'s Degree)
12.05.01 Electronic and optoelectronic devices and systems for special purposes (Specialist)
13.03.02 Electric power and electrical engineering (Bachelor\'s Degree)
15.03.04 Automation of technological processes and production (Bachelor\'s Degree)
15.05.01 Design of technological machines and complexes (Specialist)
16.03.02 High-Tech plasma and power plants (Bachelor\'s Degree)
16.03.03 Refrigeration, cryogenic equipment and life support systems (Bachelor\'s Degree)
24.05.01 Design, production and operation of missiles and space systems (Specialist)
24.05.02 Design of aircraft and rocket engines (Specialist)
24.05.04 Navigation and ballistic support for space technology applications (Specialist)

string-array.name: application_descriptions
string-array.item: Learn the steps on the \"Home\" page. Start the enrollment process now!
Keep it up! You have already completed the first steps, you can move on.
You have passed the most difficult steps, it remains for a small matter!
There are only a few steps left, push up! Be careful when submitting the original certificate, weigh all the \ " for\ "and \"against\".

string-array.name: application_steps
string-array.item: Make sure That you have filled in the correct information about your exam scores. Decide on the directions for admission. Study the programs you are interested in and their curricula. This is for You the \"Faculties and departments\" tab in the \"Catalog\" will help. \n on the \"Home\" page, you can view the current passing scores for the selected directions according to the site \npriem.bmstu.ru/ru/points
In order to save Your time when submitting documents in person go through the preliminary registration of an applicant on the website: \npriem.bmstu.ru/ru/registration/moscow

The following documents can be submitted to the admissions Committee either in person or by sending an email mail (105005, Moscow, ul. 2-ya Baumanskaya, 5, p. 1). \pdocuments can be filled in on the computer. \n fill out your consent to the processing of personal data: \nbmstu.ru/content/image/files/PK/2019/Post/Consent.pdf

Fill in the application form addressed to the Rector: 
 - # 1 (about accepting documents): 
bmstu.ru/content/image/files/PK/2019/Post/Application_1.pdf 
 - # 2 (about participation in the competition): 
bmstu.ru/content/image/files/PK/2019/Post/Application_2.pdf 	he chosen training areas / specialties are indicated in the Application no. 2 in the order of priority for the applicant.

Provide the admissions Committee with a copy of your passport (pages 2 and 3 with your personal data), and also a copy of the standard document on education (certificate). \if the document used to pass the exam differs from the passport, you must inform data about this document.

Additionally: \n Copies of diplomas of winners or prize-winners of school Olympiads (printed from the website of the Russian Council of school Olympiads), giving special rights to admission without entrance tests or to participate in the competition with the maximum possible a score of 100 points in the subject that corresponds to the profile of the Olympiad.

Additionally: 
Copies of documents confirming that you may have rights: 
-for admission based on the results of entrance tests conducted by Bauman Moscow state technical University independently 
-for admission to places within 10 % of the quota 
-priority right of crediting

Additionally: \n For applicants for targeted studying - a contract on targeted studying between the applicant and a state authority of the Russian Federation, local government, institution, enterprise, etc.

Please note that Application #2 for participation in the competition and training directions may be changed. \nIf you want to make changes, you need to send a new Application no. 2 before the date the end of the reception with the indication of your registration number in the upper-right corner. To find out your registration number, find your full name in the list of registered users (appear within 5 business days after receiving the shipment at the post office). \nbmstu.ru/abitur/general/registered

Evaluate the competitive situation and your chances of admission. Keep track of changes to the current one the tabs will help you find out about the passing scores of previous years \"Home\" and \ " Statistics\".

If the competition situation matches your exam scores, provide the reception Commission original document of education (certificate) and Application no. 3 (consent to enrollment): 
bmstu.ru/content/image/files/PK/2019/Post/Application_3.pdf 
 When writing application no. 3 and submitting the original certificate, you must attach 6 3x4 photos (signed on the back). 
 photographs will be needed for the production of a student ID card, pass, and other documents.

resources.string: You have completed all the steps! We wish you good luck to enter your chosen specialty!

A place in the hostel is provided on a competitive basis! \n students who need a hostel and have scored enough points to enroll in an educational program, but not sufficient to provide a hostel, will be credited without providing a hostel. \n There are no dormitories in the faculties of ИБМ, ФН, Л, АК, ПС, РКТ, РТ, ОЭП, СГН and ЮР.
Do you want to report an error or make a suggestion? Write to us!
The app was developed by Dmitry Pudovkin, Nikolay Luchkov, Alexey Zotov

Sources of information: 
1 -Current passing scores: priem.bmstu.ru/ru/points 
2 -previous years Passing scores: https://bmstu.ru/abitur/general/passing_scores 
3 -Documents for receipt: https://www.bmstu.ru/abitur/general/list_of_doc 
4 -News: https://bmstu.ru/mstu/info/bauman-news 
5 -Extracurricular activities: https://www.bmstu.ru/mstu/info/upcoming-events
